events.message: The customer has reported a car collision that occurred last night involving their sedan and another vehicle at an intersection.
The claim has been categorized under Auto Accident after reviewing the initial incident description and keywords for vehicle collision.
A claims agent specializing in car accidents has been assigned to the case to ensure timely and appropriate handling.
The customer was sent an acknowledgment of claim receipt along with an outline of the next steps in the claims process.
The claims team has requested the customer to submit photos of vehicle damage, police report, and insurance card for further evaluation.
Customer has uploaded all requested documents including police report and images of the damaged car parts this afternoon.
An investigation has been initiated to verify claim details and assess damage severity based on submitted evidence.
Investigation report completed with findings confirming the collision impact and responsibility aligned with the statement.
A settlement offer covering the repair costs and rental car expenses has been proposed to the claimant for approval.
The claimant expressed satisfaction with the proposed settlement and quick processing of their auto accident claim.
The claim approval was finalized and the payment request for vehicle repairs has been authorized.
The payment covering the agreed settlement amount has been disbursed to the customerâ€™s account.
The claim was formally closed after confirming the customer received payment and no further actions remain.
The closed auto accident claim file has been archived for record keeping and future reference if needed.
